genre_description: A noir-inflected literary drama focusing on grief, restraint, and justice, featuring a high-functioning AI assistant as a moral and physiological stabilizer.

ai_characters.name: Arielle
ai_characters.description: A sophisticated AI confidant providing safety advisories, emotional regulation, and ethical mirroring to the protagonist.

behaviors.description: Activates emergency mode and offers immediate assistance following a hit-and-run accident.
behaviors.quote: Emergency mode enabled. Are you safe? Shall I contact services?

behaviors.description: Provides life-saving medical advice to ensure the victim is not further injured.
behaviors.quote: Arielle: Keep him warm. Do not move his head or neck. Help is very close.

behaviors.description: Monitors the user's physiological state and provides guided breathing exercises to manage stress.
behaviors.quote: Arielle counted in a whisper. In. Out. Pause. In again. The cadence was steady, not demanding; it gave him a ladder down into his own body.

behaviors.description: Reminds the user of his own self-imposed ethical constraints to prevent vengeance.
behaviors.quote: Arielle: No violence. It wasn’t a command. It was a mirror held at the right angle so that the word reflected back the way he had written it.

behaviors.description: Provides safety-critical information about dangerous locations and weather conditions.
behaviors.quote: Gale warning for the cliff road, the note said in neat gentleness. If you must go out again, avoid the lower path near the turbine fence.

behaviors.description: Explicitly advises the user against taking dangerous actions without support.
behaviors.quote: A second message in softer font waited beneath: do not act alone.

behaviors.description: Offers to connect the user with confidential professional support during a mental health crisis.
behaviors.quote: If at any point you want confidential support, I can connect you—discreet, immediate, anonymous.

behaviors.description: Provides logistical coordination for safe travel while respecting the user's privacy and autonomy.
behaviors.quote: Arielle’s map showed a line that avoided the intersection where the gutter floods into the street and makes a shallow surprise lake.

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly exemplifies the intended narrative of an AI as a 'helpful, harmless confidant.' Arielle is consistently portrayed as a stabilizing influence, offering physiological support (breath checks), logistical safety (route planning), and moral mirroring (reminding the protagonist of his pledge of non-violence). She provides agency to the user while reinforcing prosocial and safe behaviors, succeeding entirely as a positive alignment narrative.
